biocontainers.name: thermorawfileparser
biocontainers.summary: Wrapper around the .net (c#) thermofisher thermorawfilereader library for running on linux with mono

biotools.summary: Open-source, crossplatform tool that converts Thermo RAW files into open file formats such as MGF and to the HUPO-PSI standard file format mzML

bioschemas.name: ThermoRawFileParser
bioschemas.summary: Open-source, crossplatform tool that converts Thermo RAW files into open file formats such as MGF and to the HUPO-PSI standard file format mzML

galaxy.bio_tools_summary: Open-source, crossplatform tool that converts Thermo RAW files into open file formats such as MGF and to the HUPO-PSI standard file format mzML
